title: Suns & Warriors Hot Starts, Heat vs. Bulls, Fan Questions | WHAT’S BURNIN | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: Suns & Warriors Hot Starts, Heat vs. Bulls, Fan Questions | WHAT’S BURNIN | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
WHAT'S BURNIN brings the heat as Matt and Stak breakdown all the best upcoming NBA matchup's, the Sun's & Warriors hot starts, and the potential for the Bulls and Heat in a stacked Eastern Conference. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
